changes: Published new extensions for Chrome and Firefox. Much easier login process and trade value in kolex site. (go download <3)
Fixed a bug that only affected vot_tot.
Added a lot of colors everywhere.
Changed some styles here and there. (If you see something that looks off, let me know)
New table for circulation page. You can sort by clicking on the headers (other pages soon TM).
Changed the menu layout (you'll get used to it).
New BRL prices for Brazil users.
Added Stripe payment method. (pix soon TM).
Added Paypal and Revolut payment methods links to the pricing page.
Added a FAQ to the pricing page.
Packs and sets are now stored locally for each category.
Added a leaderboard for scanner (click on the rank).
Optimized a bunch of stuff but there might be some bugs. Let me know if you find any.
Fixed a bug in set selector when you changed categories.
Fixed a bug in scanner compact mode.
Added a jump to top button on mobile for long pages.
Changed Android login tutorial.
Fixed a bug in rush where it would keep playing until you refresh the page.
Fixed some styling issues with mobile
Support for Android (yay!). If you find any bugs, please let me know.
Navbar menu now opens on hover. (you'll get used to it).
New category selection menu.
Added 'any' mint filter for cardlister.
Replaced the SK category with CS China.
Added sort option to mintsearch market results.
History page now shows progress count while searching.
Optimiezd the performance of scanner results.
Added Kolex link in the login page.
Implemented craft limits.
Fixed a bug with pack manager undercut option.
Added the option to see all results history directly from scanner and mint search.
History images should load faster now.
Moved the theme switcher icon 2 pixels to the left.
Performance improvement for places with too many cards (crafting, scanner, etc).
Login proccess is now faster (last update). Changed the console message to be more clear.
Circulation page now shows what packs are linked to the collection.
New loading spinner design.
Slightly changed some colors. If you see something that looks off, let me know.
Added new limit type and style for spinner.
Added search bar for mint search.
Pack manager now saves packs from all categories locally.
Added expiry time for login sessions.
Changelog now shows all new changes instead of just the latest.
Added list view to pack search.
Added total value for card lister.
Added total value and sort options for pack manager.
Fixed some bugs for categories other than CSGO.
Set selector now has a separator for digitals and hybrids.
You can set how many columns you see in the Pack Manager now. (Mint search soon TM).
Added listing manager to cardlister (it's huge).
Slightly changed the spinner recap design.
Added a luck indicator number for spinner recap.
Added circulation to cardlister.
Added market and recent sales details to cardlister.
Added circulation to cardlister items.
Fixed sticker icon not showing on cardlister items.
Fixed achievements not working properly.
Added this annoying thing (only shows up once).
Added achievements from all categories.
Total craft silver cost is now displayed in the craft window.
